jobDescription: Data Engineer  If you are a Data Engineer with experience, please read on!  Located in Jersey City, NJ we are a marketing/advertising technology platform transforming the way brands connect with consumers. As a member of our engineering team, we want you to bring experience bringing real products from the ground up. We use a variety of tools, technologies, and languages to build software (Scala, Elasticsearch, Aerospike, React/Redux, Kinesis/Kafka, Hadoop, MR, AWS EMR, Spark).What's In It for You
